text_126.en: A checkbox group in UI development is a collection of checkboxes grouped together for related selections or options. It allows users to make multiple choices from a set of related options. In Material Design, a checkbox group is often organized with clear spacing and alignment, providing a cohesive and visually coherent representation. This grouping enhances the user's ability to manage and understand multiple selections within the context of the application's design guidelines.

text_130.en: Add a checkbox group using the `addCheckboxGroup` method like this:

text_196.en: Here are the methods available for CheckboxGroup Component

text_198.en: Sets a callback function when the checkbox item is touch.

text_202.en: Adds a callback function to be called whent there is a change of value.

text_206.en: Sets the checked icon and unchecked icon

text_211.en: Get the checked and unchecked icon of the checkbox group.

tip_214.en: The returned object is of the form `{checked, unchecked}`.

text_216.en: Checked or unchecked a given item by its index.

text_221.en: Checked or unchecked a given item by its name.

text_226.en: Get the list of all checked items.

text_230.en: Get the current value of the item in the list.

text_235.en: Get the current value of the item in the list.

text_240.en: Sets a new text to a given item by its index.

text_245.en: Sets a new text to a given item by its name.

text_250.en: Get the text of the item in a given index.

text_255.en: Sets a new list of item in the checkbox group.

text_259.en: Enable or disable an item in the checkbox group.

text_264.en: Get the enabled state of a checkbox item.

text_269.en: Enable or disable a checkbox item by its name.

text_274.en: Get the enabled state of a checkbox item by its name.

text_278.en: Add or insert an item in the checkbox group.

text_283.en: Removes an item in the checkbox group by its corresponding index.

text_287.en: Removes an item in the checkbox group by its title name.

text_291.en: Removes the last item in the checkbox group. This will return the item being removed.

text_294.en: Removes the first item in the checkbox group. This will return the item being removed.

text_297.en: Adds a callback function on right click.

text_301.en: Sets the corner radius of the checkbox group.

text_309.en: Sets the padding of the checkbox item. See `itemPadding` property for equivalent setter/getter property.

text_32.en: Adds a callback function on right click.

text_41.en: Sets the size of the component.

text_58.en: Sets the x and y scaling of the component.

text_63.en: Returns the position of the component. The return object is of the form `{left, top, right, bottom}`

text_68.en: Sets the margin of the component.

text_76.en: Sets the padding of the component's container.

text_84.en: Sets the position of the component relative to its parent dimensions.

text_90.en: Sets the border line for the component container.

text_99.en: Sets the corner radius of the component.

text_107.en: Bring this component forward by a given z-index.

text_111.en: Bring this component backward by a given z-index.
